## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(pixiedust)
library(kableExtra)


fit <- lm(mpg ~ qsec + factor(am) + wt + factor(gear), data = mtcars)

dust(fit) %>% 
  sprinkle(col = 2:4, round = 3) %>% 
  sprinkle(col = 5, fn = quote(pvalString(value))) %>% 
  sprinkle_colnames(term = "Term", 
                    estimate = "Estimate", 
                    std.error = "SE",
                    statistic = "T-statistic", 
                    p.value = "P-value") %>% 
  kable() %>% 
  kable_styling()
```
